reviewText: This is absolutely stunning!  You will be in the dark until the very end.

You should.  It is along the same lines as "Failsafe", with just a few cast members.  The president and his immediate entourage are trapped in a mountain diner during a snow  storm, and while they are there, international tensions take the world to the brink of war.  Good plot, well acted.  Don't assume that you know what is coming...
The movie depicts the epetimy of having guts.  It identifies the qualities we, as Americans, expect in a president and not the definitive massages our leaders get.
